DEFINICJA: A part of the blastocyst from which the germ layers form.
A movement of cells during gastrulation leading to covering of another layer of cells.
A phenomenon in which one gene's product influences expression of another gene.
A plant disease that affects a large percentage of the population.
Distribution of leaves on a plant.
The study and registering of plants from a given area.
A development stage of an embryo formed of two layers of cells.
